TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignedCms extends System.Object

summary.span: 類別可以對 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息進行簽署和驗證。

span.span: The class enables signing and verifying of CMS/PKCS #7 messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密碼編譯訊息語法 RFC 與這些內容的型別，指定 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的檔案名稱副檔名與下列 MIME 類型。The Cryptographic Message Syntax RFC specifies the following MIME types and file name extensions for CMS/PKCS #7 messages with these content types. |內容類型Content type|MIME 類型MIME type|副檔名Extension| |------------------|---------------|---------------| |envelopedDataenvelopedData|application/pkcs7-mimeapplication/pkcs7-mime|.p7m.p7m| |signedDatasignedData|application/pkcs7-signatureapplication/pkcs7-signature|.p7s.p7c.p7s.p7c|

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建構函式會建立 類別的執行個體。

span.span: The constructor creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別具有下列的預設屬性值。The class has the following default property values. |屬性Property|預設值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 （資料） 長度： 01.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data)Length: zero| ||卸離的狀態：`false` CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的簽章資訊中，會包含已簽署內容。Detached state: `false` The content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.| 預設值簽署人是 SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber。The default for signers is SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber. 如果中斷連結的狀態是`false`（預設值），以及簽章資訊的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息中包含帶正負號的內容。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the signed content is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果中斷連結的狀態是`true`，無法解碼 S/MIME 訊息的用戶端仍然可以看到訊息的內容，如果它會個別傳送。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 這可能是實用的封存的應用程式，以封存訊息內容是否可以驗證訊息傳送者的真實性。This may be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.

exception.span: null 參考已傳遞至不接受它做為有效引數的方法。

span.span: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType signerIdentifierType) cil managed

param.name: signerIdentifierType
param.span: 成員，其指定簽署人的預設主旨識別項型別。

span.span: A member that specifies the default subject identifier type for signers.

summary.span: 建構函式會藉由使用指定的主旨識別項型別做為簽署人的預設主旨識別項型別，建立 類別的執行個體。

span.span: The constructor creates an instance of the class by using the specified subject identifier type as the default subject identifier type for signers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式搭配使用的預設屬性值，請參閱。For the default property values used with this constructor, see . 如果中斷連結的狀態是`false`（預設值），以及簽章資訊的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息中包含已簽署的內容。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果中斷連結的狀態是`true`，無法解碼 S/MIME 訊息的用戶端仍然可以看到訊息的內容，如果它會個別傳送。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 這可能是實用的封存的應用程式，以封存訊息內容是否可以驗證訊息傳送者的真實性。This might be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.

span.span: The constructor creates an instance of the class by using the specified subject identifier type as the default subject identifier type for signers, the content information as the inner content, and by using the detached state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中斷連結的狀態是`false`（預設值），以及簽章資訊的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息中包含已簽署的內容。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果中斷連結的狀態是`true`，無法解碼 S/MIME 訊息的用戶端仍然可以看到訊息的內容，如果它會個別傳送。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 這可能是實用的封存的應用程式，以封存訊息內容可以驗證訊息傳送者的真實性。This may be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether or not the message sender can be verified for authenticity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddCertificate(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate) cil managed
Public ReadOnly Property Certificates As X509Certificate2Collection

summary.span: 屬性會擷取與已編碼之 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息關聯的憑證。

span.span: The property retrieves the certificates associated with the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.

value.span: 集合，表示已編碼之 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的憑證集合。

span.span: An collection that represents the set of certificates for the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckHash() cil managed

summary.span: 方法會驗證 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的資料完整性。

span.span: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: 是用於只想檢查 CMS郵件雜湊而不想執行完整數位簽章驗證之特定安全性基礎架構應用程式的特殊方法。

span.span: is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications that only wish to check the hash of the CMS message, rather than perform a full digital signature verification.

summary.span: 不會驗證訊息的作者或寄件人，因為這個方法未涉及驗證數位簽章。

span.span: does not authenticate the author nor sender of the message because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.

summary.span: 如需為一般目的而檢查 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的完整性和真實性，請使用 或 方法。

span.span: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of a CMS/PKCS #7 message, use the or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不提供將 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的驗證。This method does not provide authentication of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

exception.span: 物件目前狀態的方法呼叫無效。

span.span: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

summary.span: 驗證已簽署之 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上的數位簽章。

span.span: Verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.span: 值，指定是否只驗證數位簽章，而不驗證簽署人的憑證。

span.span: A value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated.

param.span: 如果 為 ，則只驗證數位簽章。

span.span: If is , only the digital signatures are verified.

param.span: 如果為 ，則會驗證數位簽章、簽署人的憑證及憑證的目的。

span.span: If it is , the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: 如果憑證沒有金鑰使用方式，或金鑰使用方式支援數位簽章或不可否認性，憑證的目的可視為有效。

span.span: The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: 方法會驗證已簽署之 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上的數位簽章，而且可以選擇性地驗證簽署人的憑證。

span.span: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會驗證所有簽章，包括副署，將 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上。This method verifies all signatures, including countersignatures, on the CMS/PKCS #7 message. 如果沒有帶正負號的屬性包含與訊息，也會驗證這些屬性。If there are signed attributes included with the message, these attributes are also verified. 如果選擇此選項來驗證憑證，驗證憑證鏈結的整個包含的部分。If the option is chosen to validate certificates, the entire included portion of the certificate chain is validated. 如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。This method throws an exception if the verification of a digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括訊息。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容不會中斷。In this example, the message content is not detached. 訊息內容包含在訊息。The message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括訊息。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容卸離，因此訊息內容必須驗證之外，獨立訊息。In this example, the message content is detached, so the message content must verified independently of the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#2)]

param.name: extraStore

span.span: A value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated.

param.span: 如果 為 ，則只驗證數位簽章。

span.span: If is , only the digital signatures are verified.

param.span: 如果為 ，則會驗證數位簽章、簽署人的憑證及憑證的目的。

span.span: If it is , the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: 如果憑證沒有金鑰使用方式，或金鑰使用方式支援數位簽章或不可否認性，憑證的目的可視為有效。

span.span: The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: 方法會藉由使用指定的憑證集合，驗證已簽署之 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上的數位簽章，而且可以選擇性地驗證簽署人的憑證。

span.span: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會驗證所有簽章，包括副署，將 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上。This method verifies all signatures, including countersignatures, on the CMS/PKCS #7 message. 如果沒有帶正負號的屬性包含與訊息，也會驗證這些屬性。If there are signed attributes included with the message, these attributes are also verified. 如果選擇此選項來驗證憑證，驗證憑證鏈結的整個包含的部分。If the option is chosen to validate certificates, the entire included portion of the certificate chain is validated. 如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。This method throws an exception if the verification of a digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括訊息。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容不中斷，因此訊息內容包含在訊息。In this example, the message content is not detached, so the message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括訊息。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容卸離，因此必須獨立驗證訊息內容訊息。In this example, the message content is detached, so the message content must be verified independently of the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#2)]

summary.span: 建立簽章，並將簽章新增至 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息。

span.span: Creates a signature and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ComputeSignature() cil managed

summary.span: 建立簽章，並將簽章新增至 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息。

span.span: Creates a signature and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法成功形式提供`signerIdentifierType`引數的其中一個建構函式多載。This method succeeds if was provided as the `signerIdentifierType` argument of one of the constructor overloads. 否則，會擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, it throws an exception. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 下列權限，才能存取簽章金鑰：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

exception.span: .NET Framework (所有版本) 及 .NET Core 3.0 和更新版本：未指定收件者憑證。

span.span: .NET Framework (all versions) and .NET Core 3.0 and later: The recipient certificate is not specified.

exception.span: .NET Core 2.2 和較舊版本：未提供任何簽署者憑證。

span.span: .NET Core version 2.2 and earlier: No signer certificate was provided.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ComputeSignature(class System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner signer) cil managed

param.name: signer
param.span: 物件，表示簽署人。

span.span: A object that represents the signer.

summary.span: 方法會使用指定的簽署人建立簽章，並將簽章加入至 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息。

span.span: The method creates a signature using the specified signer and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 下列權限，才能存取簽章金鑰：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - - ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在計算的簽章使用不中斷的訊息內容的訊息。The following example shows the steps to compute a signature on a message with message content that is not detached. 在此情況下，將訊息內容包含在訊息。In this case, the message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#3)] 下列範例示範如何在計算的簽章使用卸離的訊息內容的訊息。The following example shows the steps to compute a signature on a message with message content that is detached. 在此情況下，必須驗證訊息內容之外，獨立訊息。In this case, the message content must be verified independently of the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#4)]

summary.span: 屬性會擷取已編碼之 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的內部內容。

span.span: The property retrieves the inner contents of the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.

value.span: 物件，表示已編碼之 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的內容。

span.span: A object that represents the contents of the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Decode(unsigned int8[] encodedMessage) cil managed

param.name: encodedMessage
param.span: 位元組值陣列，表示要解碼之已編碼的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息。

span.span: Array of byte values that represents the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message to be decoded.

summary.span: 方法會對已編碼的 訊息進行解碼。

span.span: The method decodes an encoded message.

summary.span: 在成功解碼後，就可以從 物件的屬性擷取解碼資訊。

span.span: Upon successful decoding, the decoded information can be retrieved from the properties of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法使用取自成功解碼的資訊，重設之物件的所有成員變數。This method resets all member variables of the object by using the information obtained from successful decoding. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證簽章的過程中的方法訊息。The following example shows the placement of the method in the process of verifying the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容不中斷，因此訊息內容包含在訊息。In this example, the message content is not detached, so the message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證簽章的過程中的方法訊息。The following example shows the placement of the method in the process of verifying the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容卸離，因此必須獨立驗證訊息內容訊息。In this example, the message content is detached, so the message content must be verified independently of the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: 屬性會擷取 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的版本。

span.span: The property retrieves the version of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

value.span: int 值，表示 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息版本。

span.span: An int value that represents the CMS/PKCS #7 message version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本會決定訊息是否為 PKCS #7 訊息或密碼編譯訊息語法 (CMS) 訊息。The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS 是 PKCS #7 的較新的超集。CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
